## bubbles namespace

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[MiniWorkspaceBubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.miniworkspacebubble_class.md)


</td><td>

A bubble that contains a mini-workspace which can hold arbitrary blocks. Used by the mutator icon.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TextBubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.textbubble_class.md)


</td><td>

A bubble that displays non-editable text. Used by the warning icon.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TextInputBubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.textinputbubble_class.md)


</td><td>

A bubble that displays editable text. It can also be resized by the user. Used by the comment icon.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Abstract Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Abstract Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Bubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.bubble_class.md)


</td><td>

The abstract pop-up bubble class. This creates a UI that looks like a speech bubble, where it has a "tail" that points to the block, and a "head" that displays arbitrary svg elements.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
